title: End of game stats (12/02/2015)
body:
Summoners,

We've just made a small change which is aimed at fine tuning the way the end of game stats information shows up after each match.  This is intended to make it a bit more reliable in the time it takes to appear, but we'd love to know if, starting from now, you see a delay (eg. 15 - 30 seconds) waiting for this information.

Cheers
Mindstar

replies.body: sometime my stat not show :( sad pepe
Great to hear, thanks for reporting back to us. I haven't seen any issues myself, but we would love to hear from more players that this is working.
Yeah seems pretty normal- about 7 seconds to fully load
